dsutils.disks



alias Partition = std.typecons.Tuple!(string, "device", string, "mountPoint", string, "fstype", string, "opts").Tuple;
Represent a partition mounted on the system

Partition[] diskPartitions(bool all = false);
Get all the partition mounted on the system

Params:
bool all if false, returns only physicals devices if true, returns all the devices

Returns:
a list of partition

alias DiskUsage = std.typecons.Tuple!(ulong, "total", ulong, "used", ulong, "free", float, "percent").Tuple;
Informations about the disk usage

Throws:
an exception if statvfs call failed

alias DiskStats = std.typecons.Tuple!(int, "read_count", int, "write_count", int, "read_bytes", int, "write_bytes", int, "read_time", int, "write_time").Tuple;
Io stats about the disk
